name: Faithful Servant
desc: Place 1 "Dark Magician" or 1 card that specifically lists "Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl" in its text, except "Faithful Servant", from your hand, Deck, or GY on the top of the Deck. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; draw cards equal to the number of "Palladium Oracle" monsters, "Dark Magician", and "Dark Magician Girl" on the field and in the GYs with different names. You can only use this effect of "Faithful Servant" once per turn.
